Imports

{% raw %} 
from psaw import PushshiftAPI
from tqdm import tqdm
import datetime as dt
import json
{% endraw %}

Variables

Get comments

Run query

{% raw %} 
api = PushshiftAPI()

gen = api.search_comments(
    q = 'Anglo-Saxon'
    # after = int(dt.datetime(2007, 7, 22).timestamp()),
    # before = int(dt.datetime(2020, 3, 27).timestamp())
)
{% endraw %}

collect results

{% raw %} 
print(f"\n{dt.datetime.now()}")

max_response_cache = 1000
cache = []

for c in tqdm(gen, total=max_response_cache):
    cache.append(c)

    if len(cache) >= max_response_cache:
        break

print(f"\n{dt.datetime.now()}")
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
%%time
df = pd.DataFrame([thing.d_ for thing in cache])
len(df)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
gen
